✔️Unemployment dropped to 3.9% - the lowest in decades
✔️Median household income hit an all-time high pic.twitter.com/oquDCQncTx

#LWCF is finally permanent. Now we have to make sure it has the resources necessary to continue its important conservation efforts. Read more here:  https://www.burr.senate.gov/press/releases/burr-joins-bipartisan-group-of-senators-in-push-for-permanent-lwcf-funding2019 …

On #GoldStarWivesDay, we remember that our servicemen and women are not the only ones who make grave sacrifices for our country. The courage and strength of surviving military spouses deserves our recognition, honor, and gratitude.

Specifically, this bipartisan bill will allow the VA to:
✔️Partner with public and private entities to provide legal services to veterans
✔️House children of homeless veterans w/ their families in transitional housing
✔️Provide dental care to homeless veterans

Nearly 40,000 U.S. veterans are homeless and 1.4 million are at risk of becoming homeless. I’ve reintroduced the Homeless Veterans Prevention Act to remove some of the common barriers preventing homeless vets from accessing the help they need. pic.twitter.com/xaePMCCrXj
